======Enables bones on normal drones.======

= Description =

Enables the possibility of having bones on a drone. This cvar does not guarantee bones, it simply add the possibility of randomly having them. This cvar was added to prevent drones from getting confused with the uber drones while <!--[asw_uber_scary]-->[[asw_uber_scary.wiki|asw_uber_scary]] was enabled.
